alert.note: Alert for Gallia; Lawrence (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 11:47PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Boyd, southeastern Greenup, east central Carter, eastern Gallia, Lawrence, northern Mason, central Cabell, west central Jackson and northwestern Wayne Counties through 1230 AM EDT... At 1146 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Tuppers Plains to Coalton. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Huntington, Ashland, Ironton, Point Pleasant, Gallipolis, Coal Grove, Chesapeake, Proctorville, Cannonsburg, Barboursville, Kenova, Catlettsburg, Ceredo, Princess, Coalton, Burnaugh, Naples, Rush, Durbin and Centerville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 64 in Kentucky between mile markers 175 and 191. Interstate 64 in West Virginia between mile markers 1 and 17. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM EDT for northeastern Kentucky...southeastern Ohio...and central, western and northwestern West Virginia.
